title: Snow Karma Skin Idea
body:
Anyone else think this looks really cool?

Although I know Riot wouldn't let her breasts through like that.

http://life-too-stronk-for-you.tumblr.com/post/102295519039/lol-skin-ideas-ibratze-snow-karma

http://38.media.tumblr.com/28e4fc8d02328a80e2ad6a989ee3b40c/tumblr_nemqwotHX11rs6p09o2_1280.png

And yeah, for those who brought it up; it doesn't look like Karma in these pictures, but I'm sure the splash art/skins team could manage that while maintaining the concept.
